bitshandler.message.set.message: Bits message has been set to: $1.

bitshandler.minimum.set.message: Bits minimum has been set to $1 bits.

bitshandler.rewardmulttoggle.off.message: Bits reward is now a constant value.

bitshandler.rewardmulttoggle.on.message: Bits reward is now a multiplicative factor of the number of bits.
